name: reffub-trams
description: SmartBuffer (reffub-trams) is a lightweight, efficient, and versatile buffer management library designed for handling binary data in Node.js or browser environments. It provides a convenient interface for reading and writing various data types to and from binary buffers using a DataView internally. SmartBuffer also manages internal buffer allocation, ensuring the necessary capacity for your operations without manual memory management.
author: fohz67
